title: Hopes And Hazards Of A Cease-Fire: A View From Gaza City
teaser: For a Gazan perspective on the prospect of a cease-fire, Robert Siegel talks to Mukhaimer Abu Sada, a political scientist at Al-Azhar University. They discuss the Israeli air strikes in Gaza and what must happen before fighting settles.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
